product_name: The North Face  Alpine Project Hybrid Jacket - Men's
long_description: The North Face Alpine Project Hybrid jacket for men blends tough weather resistance with a soft shell's versatility. Don't be surprised if you find yourself looking for any excuse to stay outside.
